sub_topic: Probability of a certain type of travel outcome occurring on a trip
message_1: A travel agency offers 4 different flights to Cancun for the summer season. The probability of a flight being delayed is 20%. If a family of 5 books tickets for the same flight, what is the probability that their flight will not be delayed?
message_2:
The probability of a flight not being delayed is the complement of the probability of it being delayed. Since the probability of a flight being delayed is 20%, the probability of it not being delayed is 100% - 20% = 80%.

The family of 5 books tickets for the same flight, so the probability of their flight not being delayed is still 80%.
